name: ws-test-server
description: starts a basic WebSocket server and allows line-by-line input from the stdin stream where each line must be a complete JSON object formatted so JSON.parse() can understand it. each line is sent as JSON.stringify() data to the front-end through the socket. coordination over port number can be done in three ways: specifying port to the default exported function as first parameter, specifying port in WS_TEST_PORT environment variable, or specifying no port and using default port 7071.
author: Roy McClanahan
